LogInText: pls translate You will be redirected to login with 42.
AboutT1: This website is the result of the final project in the common core at 42 school, ft_transcendence.
AboutT2: It is built using HTML/CSS, Bootstrap, React, Django, and PostgreSQL.
AboutT3: The source code for this website is available on ;
PlayT1: Go head-to-head with our cutting-edge minipongAI, powered by Django and sheer willpower.
PlayT2: Grab a friend, pull up a chair, and decide who's the better miniponger once and for all.
PlayT3: Play minipong with anyone, from anywhere, at any time.
PlayT4: Create a tournament with up to X players and battle it out to find the ultimate champion.
